faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions.

items.question: How can I sell my car?
items.answer: Selling a car on Kaarplus is easy. Log in, fill in the vehicle details and add photos. Our team verifies the listing before publication.

items.question: Does Kaarplus offer a warranty?
items.answer: We facilitate warranty offers from our partners. All vehicles have undergone a background check.

items.question: How much does it cost to list a car?
items.answer: For individuals, the first listing is free. Subsequent listings cost â‚¬9.99.

items.question: Can I trade in my car?
items.answer: Yes, many sellers are willing to accept trade-in offers. Look for listings marked 'Trade-in possible'.
